meta.description: A library for OS-independent CD-ROM and CD image access

license.fullName: GNU General Public License v2.0 or later

meta.long_description:
GNU libcdio is a library for OS-independent CD-ROM and
CD image access.  It includes a library for working with
ISO-9660 filesystems (libiso9660), as well as utility
programs such as an audio CD player and an extractor.
meta.name: libcdio
